featured.text: On a tape-recorder in another room. (D) In a studio. 53.
When they saw the room they were a bit alarmed, for it was laid out as a studio.

definition.zh_def: 工作室；錄音室；藝術家或設計師的工作場所。
definition.en_def: A room or building where an artist, musician, or designer works.
definition.example: She spent the afternoon painting in her studio.
